name: Mia Ajuda
description: University of Brasília students and professors created a platform to connect those in need during the COVID-19 pandemic with willing helpers.

name: QR Comer
description: This project aims to shorten food court lines by offering a single QR code for all restaurant orders.

name: Kalkuli
description: This website helps manage personal finances by categorizing expense photos and generating reports.

name: Police and Thief
description: This game features a police officer searching for a thief. You play as the thief, placing obstacles to hinder the officer's progress using a Breadth First Search algorithm.

name: Business Trip
description: This project is a business trip planner for Brazil. It uses Dijkstra's algorithm to find the shortest route between cities, ensuring visits to all state capitals along the way.

name: Choose Pokemons
description: This project suggests Pokémon trades based on rarity, using a greed algorithm.

name: Who wins?!
description: Three friends compete to sort random numbers, using a Merge Sort algorithm, the one that does the last move wins.

name: Minimum Cost
description: Find the shortest path from green to red in a random number matrix using dynamic programming.

name: Node Paiting
description: Paint a random graph with the fewest colors, ensuring adjacent nodes have different colors.
